lead_paragraph: Roger Federer extended his grasscourt streak to 57 matches with a victory over Marcos Baghdatis and will play Nicolas Kiefer in the semifinals of the Gerry Weber Open in Halle, Germany. Second-seeded James Blake needed eight match points to defeat the wild card Andreas Beck.
